name: Quantum Computing Breakthrough
brief_description: Advancements in quantum processors allowing for complex simulations and cryptography breaking.
possible_impact: Revolutionize drug discovery, materials science, and secure communications.
required_resources: Superconducting qubits, cryogenic cooling systems, advanced error correction algorithms.
dependencies: Stable quantum hardware platforms, scalable quantum algorithms.

name: AI-Driven Drug Discovery
brief_description: AI models predicting molecular interactions for faster drug development.
possible_impact: Accelerate pharmaceutical innovation, reduce costs, and personalize medicine.
required_resources: Large datasets of molecular structures, high-performance computing clusters.
dependencies: Integration with existing biotech labs, regulatory approvals.

name: CRISPR Gene Editing Enhancements
brief_description: Improved precision and safety in editing human DNA for treating genetic diseases.
possible_impact: Cure inherited disorders, enhance human health, and ethical debates on designer babies.
required_resources: Advanced CRISPR kits, bioinformatics tools, clinical trial facilities.
dependencies: Ethical guidelines, government regulations on genetic modification.

name: Autonomous Electric Vehicles
brief_description: Fully self-driving EVs with advanced sensors and AI for urban mobility.
possible_impact: Reduce accidents, lower emissions, transform transportation systems.
required_resources: LIDAR sensors, AI processing units, battery technology.
dependencies: Infrastructure for charging, regulatory frameworks for autonomy.

name: 5G and Beyond Networks
brief_description: Ultra-fast, low-latency networks enabling IoT and immersive experiences.
possible_impact: Enable smart cities, remote surgery, and high-definition streaming.

name: Sustainable Energy Storage
brief_description: High-capacity batteries using new materials for renewable energy storage.
possible_impact: Support grid stability, electric vehicles, and off-grid solutions.
dependencies: Advances in lithium-ion alternatives, recycling technologies.

name: Brain-Computer Interfaces
brief_description: Devices allowing direct brain-to-device communication for prosthetics and control.
possible_impact: Aid disabled individuals, enhance human augmentation, privacy concerns.

name: Space Tourism Expansion
brief_description: Commercial flights to space stations and lunar bases.
possible_impact: Democratize space access, boost space economy, inspire STEM education.

name: Augmented Reality Glasses
brief_description: Wearable AR devices for everyday use in navigation and information overlay.
possible_impact: Enhance productivity, education, and entertainment experiences.
dependencies: Battery life improvements, user interface design.

name: Nanotechnology in Medicine
brief_description: Nano-scale devices for targeted drug delivery and diagnostics.
possible_impact: Improve treatment efficacy, reduce side effects, enable early disease detection.
dependencies: Regulatory approvals, integration with healthcare systems.

name: Fusion Energy
brief_description: Achieving net-positive energy from nuclear fusion reactions.
possible_impact: Provide clean, abundant energy, reduce fossil fuel dependence.
dependencies: Breakthrough in plasma confinement, international collaboration.

name: Blockchain for Supply Chains
brief_description: Transparent, immutable ledgers for tracking goods and reducing fraud.
possible_impact: Enhance traceability, combat counterfeiting, improve efficiency.

name: Personalized AI Assistants
brief_description: Advanced AI companions adapting to individual needs and preferences.
possible_impact: Streamline daily tasks, provide mental health support, raise privacy issues.
required_resources: Large language models, user data analytics.
dependencies: Data privacy laws, ethical AI development.

name: Vertical Farming Tech
brief_description: Indoor, stacked agriculture using hydroponics and AI for optimal growth.
possible_impact: Increase food production, reduce water usage, enable urban farming.

name: Holographic Displays
brief_description: 3D holographic projections for communication and entertainment.
possible_impact: Revolutionize remote collaboration, gaming, and medical imaging.
